attributes.action: Mandatory for independant drug testing agencies to attend Music Festivals
attributes.additional_details: The welfare, safety and protection of young people is veyr important thing for the government. Young people need informed choices when attending these events. Some events have drug testing agencies where there are no deaths & hospital admissions are reduced  Parents cant stop what happens at these events but the government can help to make them less dangerous. Young people are more vunerable and need testing to be safer. Government can direct Local Councils to ensure drug testing at Festivals
attributes.background: Make it mandatory for Festival Event organisers to have Independant drug testing agencies on site at all events. Thus providing a safe place for young people to make an informed decision about the safety of drugs they are offered at festivals before consuming them.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622838
